baseline.suptitle: Is your area eligible for <u>second</u> or <u>third</u> year
baseline.title: Working Holiday Visa?

about.p1: To be eligible to apply for a second or third Working Holiday (subclass 417) visa, you must complet a prescribed minimum period of specified work in an area classified as part of Regional Australia.
about.p2: New: Bushfire recovery work carried out after 31 July 2019 is now eligible specified work in Bushfire affected areas.
about.caption: Last update: {date}
